field.output: Note: PD Incident/Service Desk Module uses different category tables as non-PD, if you are using reports on the non-PD category tables (category, subcategory, producttype), please check the checkbox , otherwise you need to udpate your report to use the PD category related tables (imCategory, imSubcategory, imArea, sdCategory, sdSubcategory, sdArea) instead of the non-PD category related tables.

Label;Caption=Use PD solution matching: Height=2 Name= Width=25 X=0 Y=9
CheckBox;?State= Height=2 Name= Width=4 X=29 Y=9 Input=$use.pd.solution.matching

field.output: Note: PD Incident module uses the new solution matching which is different as non-PD Incident solution matching. But Non-PD solution matching configuration is at profile level, which is not migrated to PD security, if you keep to use non-PD solution matching, you need to migrate the solution matching configuration to PD security manually.
